glsa.title: SPE: Insecure file permissions
glsa.synopsis: SPE files are installed with world-writeable permissions, potentially leading to privilege escalation.

background.p: SPE is a cross-platform Python Integrated Development Environment (IDE).

description.p: It was reported that due to an oversight all SPE's files are set as world-writeable.

impact.p: A local attacker could modify the executable files, causing arbitrary code to be executed with the permissions of the user running SPE.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All SPE users should upgrade to the latest version:
